channel.title: CVE Feed for iThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for iThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-31474|2024-08-03T07:19:06.133Z -- ithemes -- backupbuddy
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in iThemes BackupBuddy allows Path Traversal.This issue affects BackupBuddy: from 8.5.8.0 through 8.7.4.1.
